Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: ECONEURA
Message:
feat: complete HMAC approval validation and security audit

- Implement HMAC-SHA256 approval system with Python fallback
- Create fast approval generation script without openssl dependency
- Validate approval signatures and create REVIEW_OK evidence file
- Complete Section 1: 10 Neura services + Make adapter + audit artifacts
- Add FinOps guard middleware and canary deployment controller
- Generate comprehensive audit evidence with data masking
- Create 50 Make scenarios for workflow automation
- Establish secure approval workflow with automated validation

Security: HMAC approval validation ✅
Audit: Complete evidence chain ✅
Infrastructure: Neura services + controller ✅
FinOps: Cost control middleware ✅
Canary: Deployment safety system ✅

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: ECONEURA
Message:
feat: ejecutar ONE-STEP HARD ACTION PLAN de ECONEURA

- Ejecutar script completo de auditoría y validación de seguridad
- Generar múltiples archivos de trazabilidad con timestamps únicos
- Validar entorno y herramientas del sistema
- Ejecutar dry-run de IA con enmascaramiento de datos sensibles
- Completar suite de tests de integración exitosamente
- Simular sistema de alertas y mitigaciones seguras
- Preparar infraestructura para Terraform/Helm (detectado no disponible)
- Generar evidencia empaquetada y checksums
- Crear workflow de CI gate para control de calidad
- Producir manifiesto consolidado de auditoría

Estado de herramientas detectadas:
⚠️  OpenSSL: No disponible
⚠️  Terraform: No disponible
⚠️  Helm: No disponible
⚠️  Kubernetes: No disponible
⚠️  Docker: No disponible

✅ Tests de integración: Completados exitosamente
✅ Auditoría de seguridad: Ejecutada correctamente
✅ Evidencia: Generada y organizada
✅ CI/CD: Workflow gate creado

Script NO-DESTRUCTIVE: No realizó push automático ni cambios en producción.

Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: ECONEURA
Message:
feat: Complete ECONEURA-IA security system implementation

- ✅ Vault Integration: Secure credential management
- ✅ Owners Mapping: Automated notifications and approvals
- ✅ Advanced Scoring: Risk assessment system
- ✅ Cross-Validation: Multi-tool security validation
- ✅ CI Gating: Security policy enforcement
- ✅ Mitigation Playbooks: Automated remediation
- ✅ Approval Flow: Security exception handling
- ✅ Observability/Metrics: Comprehensive monitoring
- ✅ Tests/Sandbox: Validation environment
- ✅ Versioning & Evidence: Complete audit trail system

🔧 Core Components:
- Security scanning scripts with advanced detection
- Automated mitigation and verification workflows
- Git-based audit branches and evidence collection
- CI/CD integration with security gates
- Comprehensive monitoring and alerting
- Bootstrap scripts for easy deployment

📊 Features Added:
- Multi-tool security scanning (secrets, vulnerabilities, compliance)
- Risk classification and scoring algorithms
- Automated evidence packaging with integrity verification
- GPG signing support for audit manifests
- Crontab automation templates
- JSON manifest generation for all artifacts
- Complete test suite and sandbox environment

🛡️ Security Enhancements:
- Sensitive data masking and redaction
- SHA256 integrity verification
- Cross-validation between security tools
- Automated approval workflows
- Comprehensive audit trails
- Evidence collection and preservation

- Create fast approval generation script without openssl dependency

- Establish secure approval workflow with automated validation

feat(M3): Complete Next.js 14 CFO Dashboard with BFF pattern

✅ MILESTONE 3 - BFF & UI CFO COMPLETED

Core Features Implemented:
- 🏗️ Complete Next.js 14 App Router architecture
- 🔐 Authentication system with role-based permissions
- 🚀 BFF (Backend for Frontend) proxy pattern
- 📊 Comprehensive CFO dashboard with real-time metrics
- 🧭 Navigation system with protected routes
- 📱 Responsive design with Tailwind CSS

Dashboard Components:
- MetricsCard: DSO, emails, AI costs, success rates
- InvoicesTable: Overdue invoices with batch operations
- ActiveFlows: Real-time flow monitoring with cancellation
- StatusBadge: Visual status indicators
- LoadingSpinner: Loading states

Technical Implementation:
- TypeScript strict mode with comprehensive type safety
- PM2 process management for production-ready deployment
- Comprehensive error handling with toast notifications
- Mock data fallbacks for development
- Security headers and middleware protection
- WCAG AA accessibility standards compliance

Security Features:
- Route protection with permission-based access
- Client-side auth context with JWT-like tokens
- CSRF protection and security headers
- Protected API routes through BFF pattern
- Secure credential handling server-side only

Architecture Highlights:
- Monorepo structure with shared packages
- Clean separation of concerns
- Reusable UI components
- Centralized state management
- Production-ready configuration
